<script>
$(window).load(function(){
  var $tiles = $('.advisor-tiles .advisor-tile');
  $tiles.leveller({
    cssSelector: '.advisor-tile-actions',
    cssProperty: 'margin-top'
  });
  $(window).resize($.debounce(function(){
    $tiles.leveller();
  }, 250));
});
</script>
